Traits.Name: Flank
Traits.Description: Loses all armor if 2 or more foes are adjacent.

Actions.Name: Wind Up
Actions.Description: Next Slam costs 1 action and gains +1 boon. Lose this effect if they move.

Actions.Name: Bash
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 and must save or become winded.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Hit: Deal heavy damage and character must save or become vulerable.
